蒲.definition: refers to various monocotyledonous flowering plants including Acorus calamus and Typha orientalis; common cattail; bullrush

蒲包.definition: cattail bag; (old) gift of fruit or pastries (traditionally presented in a cattail bag)

蒲團.definition: praying mat (Buddhism, made of woven cattail)

蒲圻.definition: Puqi, old name for Chibi, county-level city 赤壁市[Chi4 bi4 shi4], Xianning 咸寧市|咸宁市[Xian2 ning2 shi4], Hubei

蒲圻市.definition: Puqi, old name for Chibi, county-level city 赤壁市[Chi4 bi4 shi4], Xianning 咸寧市|咸宁市[Xian2 ning2 shi4], Hubei

蒲城.definition: Pucheng County in Weinan 渭南[Wei4 nan2], Shaanxi

蒲城縣.definition: Pucheng County in Weinan 渭南[Wei4 nan2], Shaanxi

蒲松齡.definition: Pu Songling (1640-1715), author of 聊齋志異|聊斋志异[Liao2 zhai1 Zhi4 yi4]

蒲棒.definition: spike or male flower of cattail (Typha orientalis)

蒲江.definition: Pujiang county in Chengdu 成都[Cheng2 du1], Sichuan

蒲江縣.definition: Pujiang county in Chengdu 成都[Cheng2 du1], Sichuan

蒲瓜.definition: white flowered gourd or calabash (family Crescentia)

蒲縣.definition: Pu county in Linfen 臨汾|临汾[Lin2 fen2], Shanxi

蒲菜.definition: edible rhizome of cattail 香蒲[xiang1 pu2]
